question: Salaams Mufti Saheb, Is it permissible to go right ahead and pray the Fard of Zuhr and leave out the sunnats when pressed for time?
answer:
QUESTION
Usually on Wednesdays, I have a 5 minute break inbetween classes. Now im faced with a problem, because the time will be up for zhur when my second class ends. Can I just read the 4 fard and try to make up the sunnats some other time?
ANSWER


Share:
Assalaamu Alaykum wa Rahmatullaahi wa Barakaatuhu

Due to the time constraint, you will be excused.

Was salaam

Mufti E Desai
Fatwa Dept.
